# One glob-like regex pattern per line (matched case-insensitively against asset names)
# At least one "manual" PDF file stamped with _g<commit>:
.*manual.*_g[0-9a-f]{7,12}\.pdf$

# At least one "appendix" PDF file stamped with _g<commit>:
.*appendix.*_g[0-9a-f]{7,12}\.pdf$

# Field cards bundle (any field card PDF)
.*fieldcard.*\.pdf$
